projects.title: Symbiota (Herbaria)
projects.description: Developing on-line tools to aid the generation, exploration and management of biodiversity data (collection specimens, observations, images, checklists, keys, etc.).

projects.title: Boston Police Index
projects.description: A comprehensive data portal for researchers, journalists, and community members to analyze police activities, compensation, and accountability measures.

projects.title: Open Source System for 3D Printing Robot
projects.description: Users can design mechanical structures, submit them for automated 3D printing and testing by the BEAR robot, track the status of their experiments, view results, and compare performance on a public leaderboard.

projects.title: Robinhood Portfolio
projects.description: A Flask web application for tracking and analyzing your Robinhood portfolio with real-time data, sector allocation charts, and investment simulation tools.

projects.title: EcoID
projects.description: Mobile app that lets users snap wildlife photos, uses Gemini to identify species traits, and logs sightings to a map with journal entries.

projects.title: Multi-threaded Image Processing Server
projects.description: A C/POSIX multi-threaded server using worker pools and semaphores to queue and process image operations concurrently.

projects.title: Neural Networks Visualizer
projects.description: A custom MLP trainer that animates decision boundaries and gradient flows during training on separable data.

projects.title: Logistic Regression Visualizer
projects.description: A Python/Flask visualizer that shows how cluster separation affects logistic regression decision boundaries and metrics.

projects.title: LR & Hypothesis Testing Simulator
projects.description: Flask tool to run thousands of regression simulations and visualize confidence intervals and hypothesis tests.

projects.title: Linear Regression Visualizer
projects.description: A Flask app that simulates and plots linear regression on large synthetic datasets in real time.

projects.title: Latent Semantic Analysis Search Engine
projects.description: An LSA-based search tool that ranks 18k+ documents with SVD and cosine similarity.

projects.title: KMeans Clustering Visualizer
projects.description: An interactive KMeans demo (with multiple initializations) that visualizes centroid updates and convergence.

projects.title: Portfolio v2.0 - v2.1
projects.description: A second iteration on my portfolio site built with React to showcase my skills, experience, and projects.

projects.title: Recipe Recommender System
projects.description: A recipe finder that uses Spoonacular plus Firebase to fetch ingredient-based meals, save history, and generate shopping lists with Sam's Club API.

projects.title: Sprofile
projects.description: A Spotify/Ticketmaster mashup that uses Spotify auth to pull user/library data and surfaces matching artist events in real time.

projects.title: OCaml Interpreter
projects.description: An interpreter implementing core evaluation rules, stack commands, and traces for a mini OCaml-like language.

projects.title: StreamSift
projects.description: A TMDB-powered movie/TV browser that surfaces trending titles and rich details with fast search.

projects.title: NoteCove
projects.description: A Firebase-backed notes app with auth, storage, and real-time data access for user notes and profiles.

projects.title: Portfolio v1
projects.description: A first personal portfolio site built with HTML/CSS/JS/jQuery to showcase education, experience, and projects.

projects.title: Countrx
projects.description: A country explorer that pulls REST Countries data and Google Maps embeds to show stats and maps for 195 nations.

projects.title: Dow Jones Stock Predictor
projects.description: A Streamlit app that forecasts Dow Jones stocks using 5 years of historical data, regression models, and interactive visualizations.

projects.title: Conversion Calculator
projects.description: A web calculator that handles arithmetic plus quick unit conversions across area, length, and temperature.

projects.title: Brawldata.js
projects.description: A Node.js wrapper around the BrawlApi that simplifies and speeds up retrieval of game data for developers.
